mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MGV_FILE_INFO(ORIGIN_NAME , STORED_NAME , FILE_EXTENSION , FILE_SIZE , UPLOAD_PATH , REG_DATE) VALUES (#{originName}, #{storedName}, #{fileExtension}, #{fileSize}, #{uploadPath}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT FILE_ID , ORIGIN_NAME , STORED_NAME , FILE_EXTENSION , FILE_SIZE , UPLOAD_PATH , REG_DATE FROM MGV_FILE_INFO WHERE FILE_ID = #{value}
